ai-tha-ap485:1.1_0: When I plunged into the lotus pond,
ai-tha-ap485:1.2_0: I’ll quickly enter the delightful forest,
ai-tha-ap485:1.4_0: I was flailing with the causing.
ai-tha-ap485:2.1_0: At a time when the Buddha tread,
ai-tha-ap485:3.3_0: are jealous of me, they tremble,
ai-tha-ap485:3.4_0: and he saw the world speedless.
ai-tha-ap485:4.2_0: As long as I wished for the world.
ai-tha-ap485:5.2_0: the seer taught me the Dhamma.’
ai-tha-ap485:6.2_0: the seer taught me the Dhamma.
ai-tha-ap485:7.3_0: When I’ve given up this kind,
ai-tha-ap485:9.2_0: and that I could go to me.
ai-tha-ap485:11.3_0: I was seated at the time,
ai-tha-ap485:12.2_0: I’ll lie down in my presence.
ai-tha-ap485:12.4_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap485:13.1_0: if it is six thousand coins;
ai-tha-ap485:14.1_0: when it comes to a human existence,
ai-tha-ap485:14.3_0: I have no wealth on wealth,
ai-tha-ap485:15.1_0: The sage gave me the going forth
ai-tha-ap485:15.4_0: Now there is no further existence.
ai-tha-ap485:16.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap485:17.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap485:19.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap485:20.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dasama.
ai-tha-ap485:21.1_0: The most senior monk who was a in debate.
